spell.name: Daasis' roll of madness
entries: Choose a creature within range. The creature gets imbued with psychic energy attacking it through the nervous system. The creature must succed a Wisdom saving throw or take {@damage 1d8} psychic damage. On a roll of 8, the target is also {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn. This cantrip does not affect constructs or undead.
The spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d8}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}).

spell.name: Coin Toss
entries: Whenever you see a creature within range attempting an attack or a saving throw, you can let fate decide. Toss a coin (or roll a {@dice 1d2}). On heads (or a 1) it adds +2 to the roll and on tails (or a 2) it adds -2.
A creature is not a valid target of this spell if it's already being targettend by this spell.
